TopicTitle: mouse wheel not working in editor or flight

Articles.Content: i've tried doing what the other posts on this topic i've uninstalled and reinstalled 3 times and uninstalled all the mods to the same effect any help is a appreciated thanks in advance
Does your mouse wheel work when not using KSP? Check the control bindings in the main menu settings are still set?

3 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

Does your mouse wheel work when not using KSP? Check the control bindings in the main menu settings are still set?

yes it works in like choosing a save file to load and other things its just the vab/sph or in flight where it does not work.
